title: Wales full-back Liam Williams ruled out of rest of World Cup with ankle injury
text:
Liam Williams has been ruled out of the rest of the World Cup and will miss Wales’ semi-final with South Africa after the superstar full-back picked up an ankle injury in training.

Warren Gatland’s side will take on the giant Springboks on Sunday, but Williams won’t feature in Yokohama or in next weekend’s final if his team make it that far.

It is a huge blow to Wales’ chances of reaching the last two with Williams currently on crutches. The 28-year-old has emerged as one of the leading full-backs in world rugby in the last year and has been in fine form in Japan.

Williams trained with Wales on Wednesday, but it is understood he suffered an ankle problem in that day’s afternoon session after...
description: Liam Williams has been ruled out of the rest of the World Cup and will miss Wales’ semi-final with South Africa after the superstar full-back picked up an ankle injury in training.
